text: Zotz! is a 1962 American fantasy comedy movie directed by William Castle and based on the 1947 novel by Walter Karig. It stars Tom Poston, Julia Meade, Jim Backus, Cecil Kellaway and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1962 comedy movies Category:1962 fantasy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:American spy movies Category:Spy comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by William Castle
title: Zotz!
